main.name: Ziyue Zhang
main.description2: I'm a Product Manager + Front-end Developer.
main.bio: I'm passionate about building beautiful products that users need -- whether that's by running A/B tests as part of a new feature launch or whipping up a new React Component from scratch. I'm working to make the world a more empathetic and connected place.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: My work experience has fostered a strong proficiency in Java and JavaScript-based languages, but my engineering education has provided me the fundamentals to pick up any language quickly. If you don't see a language here that you need, I'm always happy to learn something new!

education.school: The University of Texas at Austin
education.degree: Bachelors in Electrical and Computer Engineering
education.description: Graduated with High Honors and a 3.96 GPA with a concentration in Software Engineering. Acheived a minor in Business with a concentration in Marketing. Studied abroad at the University of Edinburgh, Scotland.
